name: You Be At Orbit (2022)
description:
This is a small space shooter written for DOS Game August Jam 2022.

The core of the game and the engine has been developed over the last few years as an experiment, the Game Jam version now finally pushed into a releasable state with some nice artwork and new content added. The game is written in a custom language, which in turn was written in C (some parts of the codebase are actually C-based extension modules to this custom language).

DOS / DJGPP DPMI / VGA (Mode X) / Sound Blaster
